entry.title: Wake Me Up When You’re Reincarnated (when I'm wiser and I'm older)
entry.summary:
Author: unrealisticdreamer101

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,976Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 16

Summary: Arthur died. Merlin didn’t. (Unfortunately).Fifteen hundred years later, Merlin’s still here—older, grumpier, and very much done with humanity’s nonsense. He’s spent most of that time waiting (somewhat dramatically) for Arthur to return, keeping his magic quiet and his expectations lower than sea level.Then, in the chaos of the mid 21st century—climate crisis, endless wars, suspiciously bad Wi-Fi—Merlin feels it. Arthur is back. Not as a king, of course. That would be far too easy. No, he’s reborn into a wealthy but entirely unroyal family, with the charisma of a golden retriever and the attention span of a mayfly. Ooh, but Arthur's enemies also seem to have reincarnated. Merlin doesn't remember reading a disclaimer about that! Arthurs memory seems a bit patchy too. By which it seems is has almost entirely vanished. Slight problem?The world doesn’t need monarchs anymore. It needs celebrities. Icons. So Merlin reinvents himself as a kindergartener (long story), grows up beside Arthur (longer story), and eventually becomes his manager (don’t ask).Reincarnation, slow burn friendship (which threatens to become romance, how horrific), and one very tired wizard trying to keep destiny on track.
